Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.4 Ariyamaggavagga
4.4.1 Ariyamaggasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Ariyamaggavagga
Ariyamaggasutta
189.
1355“Ariyamaggañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anariyamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo.
1356Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo”ti.
1357Paṭhamaṃ.
<< 4.4 Ariyamaggavaggaup4.4.2 Kaṇhamaggasutta >>
